sobre-mi.title: About Me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi: Developer focused on Frontend Web Development. As someone who loves intuitive and aesthetically pleasing designs, I aim to create projects that provide the best user experience.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: AtlanticMC is a Pixelmon Minecraft server with an active and friendly community. It features over 50 daily players, constant events, and a world designed for training, exploring, and having fun.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: NexusCraft is a Minecraft survival server focused on community, economy, and building. It has over 100 active players every day.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: FrogCraft is a Minecraft survival server focused on classic gameplay, community, and progressing at your own pace. With an average of 50 active players, it offers a stable, friendly environment full of opportunities to build, explore, and enjoy survival the way it’s meant to be.

contacto.title: Contact
contacto.text: Fill out the form below and I’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
